Title:
Diaporthe orixae sp. nov, an endophytic fungus found on Orixa
japonica in Southern China
Keywords:
1 novel species, Endophytic, Diaporthales, Micro-fungi,
Taxonomy
Abstract:
In this paper, we present a novel endophytic fungus with
an asexual morph, Diaporthe orixae, based on ITS, his3, cal, tub2 and
tef1-Î± DNA sequence data. The multigene phylogenetic analysis shows that
the new taxon forms a distinct clade and is closely related to D.
sackstonii and D. caryae. Detailed description, color photo plates, and
phylogenetic analyses are provided to show the placement of the new
species, as well as the comparison with the closely related taxa.
